oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A curious description of a dance and other doings of sorcerers was given in explanation of No. 3 of Mr Stow s copies of Bushman paintings (L V.
5775). Further details regarding sorcerers (suggested by Mr J.M. Orpen s copy of Bushman paintings published in the for July, 1874) were also given by D !kw in (L V.
